page.title: 06SUMMER FESTIVAL 1985
page.content: The following events are part of the Summer Festival: OPENING CEREMONY with the mayor, band and majorettes in Red Lion Yard. A COUNTRY CONFECTION, dance and drama by Okehampton Primary School. CAFE DE CRAON, a French evening presented by the Okehampton Twinning Association, for a wine and cheese tasting competition. COMMUNITY FAIR, at the College. OKEHAMPTON ENTERTAINS, music, songs and humour by local performers. MOON IN THE VALLEY, a Castle Happening about the spirit world by College students, set in the castle grounds. FLORAMANIA, floral demonstration. BELFRY OPEN NIGHT, bellringing. 3 FOR THE PRICE OF 1. 3 one-act plays. COUNTRY FAIR AND RAM ROAST, with stalls sideshows and enterainments in Simmons Park, Okehampton.
